0:
# remap app name from label
.custom_app_name = .pod_labels."app.kubernetes.io/name" || .pod_labels.app || .pod_labels."k8s-app" || "unknown"
# remap pod name from event
.custom_pod_name = .pod_name || "unknown"
# drop remapped fields
del(.pod_labels)
1:
# remap app name from label
.custom_app_name = .pod_labels."app.kubernetes.io/name" || .pod_labels.app || .pod_labels."k8s-app" || "unknown"
# remap pod name from event
.custom_pod_name = .pod_name || "unknown"
# drop remapped fields
del(.pod_labels)

0:
mqtt:
  host: emqx.home.svc.cluster.local
  username: ${DT_MQTT_USERNAME}
  password: ${DT_MQTT_PASSWORD}

frigate:
  url: http://frigate.home.svc.cluster.local:5000
  cameras:
    - reolink_frontdoor
    - amcrest_frontyard
    - amcrest_pool
    - reolink_bush
    - loryta_deck
    - amcrest_garage

  #zones:
  #  - camera: amcrest_frontyard
  #    zone:
  #      - walkway
  #      - street
  #      - driveway
  #  - camera: reolink_frontdoor
  #    zone:
  #      - walkway
  #      - driveway
  #      - street
  #  - camera: amcrest_pool
  #    zone: pool
  #  - camera: reolink_bush
  #    zone:
  #      - pool
  #      - greenway

detect:
  match:
    save: true
  unknown:
    save: true

detectors:
  deepstack:
    enabled: true
    url: "http://deepstack.home.svc.cluster.local:5000"

time:
  timezone: ${TIMEZONE}

0:
[cyberpower-ups]
  driver = usbhid-ups
  port = auto
  desc = "CyberPower CP1500 AVR"
  pollinterval = 10

[upsmon]
  password  = "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}"
  actions = SET
  instcmds = ALL
  upsmon primary

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
HOSTSYNC 15

  upsmon primary

MONITOR cyber-power@localhost:3493 1 upsmon "${SECRET_NUT_PASSWORD}" primary
SHUTDOWNCMD "/sbin/shutdown -h +0"
POWERDOWNFLAG /etc/killpower
POLLFREQ 15
POLLFREQALERT 5
